column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////The choice of tapas was certainly impressive
column2: the service not so much. There was much mushroom to choose from
column3: none made an impact. My top 2 picks - the goatcheese/tomato sauce
column4: and the chocolate tres leches. The salads were a trifle insipid
column6: but here maybe what we singled out from the selection was a bit to blame.
